subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nick Swisher, who knocked in the winning run in the opener of a Yankee-Red Sox series, sees a midsummer game between likely playoff contenders as no different from a postseason confrontation.
snippet: Nick Swisher, who knocked in the winning run in the opener of a Yankee-Red Sox series, sees a midsummer game between likely playoff contenders as no different from a postseason confrontation.
